about

I am a UI/UX focused software engineer with experience in full-stack development that is passionate about crafting intuitive, accessible digital experiences. With a sharp eye for detail and a love for micro-interactions, I create experiences that are a joy to use. I enjoy learning and collaborating on projects that improve people's lives and well-being.



This website, much like myself, is a work in progress. This could be considered the seed of my Digital Garden , where I will be building and learning in public. As you visit (and re-visit) this space, things will grow and evolve as my design and engineering skills do.
